value: L 4 169 Pirie St, Adelaide, 5000, SA, Australia

7371 - Computer Programming Services Summary > HAMB SYSTEMS LIMITED is an Australian public company. Its operations cover computer programming services. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. HAMB SYSTEMS LIMITED is headquartered in Adelaide, South Australia. It is headed by chief executive officer James Robins. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $35.54 million. Its net profit totalled $6.30 million. HAMB SYSTEMS LIMITED forms part of the services industry sector.
